Title: VS Code Live: Agent Sessions Day
Description:
Join us for VS Code Live: Agent Sessions Day on Feb 19th: a global virtual event celebrating how Visual Studio Code continues to evolve as the world’s most loved editor, now redefined with AI. Join the product team for live demos showing how VS Code enables agentic development while staying true to its core values: open, extensible, and deeply community‑driven. See how developers are using agents, customizable workflows, and open integrations to build smarter.

AGENDA: Welcome, Olivia Guzzardo McVicker Agent HQ Vision, Kyle Daigle Keynote demo, Harald Kirschner How VS Code Builds with AI, Peng Lyu and Pierce Boggan A Unified Agent Experience, Josh Spicer Extend Agents with MCP, Connor Peet The Browser in your Editor, Kyle Cutler, Justin Chen, Joaquin Ruales Bring your own model in VS Code, Sandeep Somavarapu How we Ship Models, Julia Kasper Customize your Agents, Courtney Webster Copilot CLI in VS Code, Alex Weininger Best Practices for Agentic Coding, Burke Holland, Pierce Boggan Closing message, Kai Metzel

Stay up-to-date on all things GitHub by connecting with us:

YouTube: https://gh.io/subgithub Blog: https://github.blog X: https://twitter.com/github LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/github Insider newsletter: https://resources.github.com/newsletter/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/github TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@github

About GitHub It’s where over 180 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Author: GitHub
